projects.title: Console Chess (C++)
projects.shortDesc: Object-oriented chess game with move validation and checkmate detection.
projects.fullDesc: A fully functional console-based chess game built in C++ demonstrating object-oriented programming principles. Features include complete move validation for all pieces, check/checkmate detection, turn-based gameplay, and a clean ASCII board display. This project helped me understand design patterns, game state management, and algorithmic thinking.
contributions: Designed class hierarchy for chess pieces
Implemented move validation logic for all piece types
Built checkmate and stalemate detection algorithms

projects.title: Maze Solver (BFS/DFS)
projects.shortDesc: Algorithm-driven maze pathfinding with visualization and data export.
projects.fullDesc: An algorithm visualization tool that solves mazes using Breadth-First Search (BFS) and Depth-First Search (DFS) algorithms. The application reads maze configurations, finds optimal paths, and stores results in JSON/SQLite for analysis. Includes step-by-step visualization to understand how each algorithm explores the maze differently.
contributions: Implemented BFS and DFS pathfinding algorithms
Built maze parsing and validation system
Created data persistence layer with SQLite/JSON
Developed visual representation of algorithm execution

projects.title: Full-stack Blog App
projects.shortDesc: Complete blog platform with React frontend, Node.js backend, and MongoDB.
projects.fullDesc: A full-stack blog application demonstrating modern web development practices. The frontend is built with React featuring responsive design and optimistic UI updates. The backend uses Node.js with Express, MongoDB for data storage, and JWT for authentication. Includes full CRUD operations, file uploads for images, user authentication, and comment system.
contributions: Built responsive React frontend with component architecture
Developed RESTful API with Node.js and Express
Designed MongoDB schema and data models
Added file upload functionality for blog images

projects.title: Phishing Awareness Tool
projects.shortDesc: Ethical security simulation for phishing awareness training.
projects.fullDesc: An educational tool designed to raise awareness about phishing attacks in a controlled, ethical environment. The simulation demonstrates common phishing techniques without storing any sensitive data. Built for training purposes to help users recognize suspicious emails, fake login pages, and social engineering tactics. Includes detailed explanations of each technique and prevention tips.
contributions: Built educational content explaining attack vectors

projects.title: Network Simulation - Siber Koza
projects.shortDesc: Enterprise network design with VLANs, routing, and ACLs using Cisco Packet Tracer.
projects.fullDesc: A comprehensive network simulation designed for Siber Koza to model enterprise-grade infrastructure. The project includes VLAN segmentation, inter-VLAN routing, access control lists (ACLs), and failover testing scenarios. Used for training network administrators and validating configurations before physical deployment. Demonstrates understanding of networking fundamentals and Cisco technologies.

projects.title: Finance Tracker App
projects.shortDesc: Cross-platform mobile app for personal finance management built with Flutter.
projects.fullDesc: A feature-rich personal finance tracking application developed using Flutter and Dart. The app allows users to track income, expenses, set budgets, and visualize spending patterns through interactive charts. Features include category-based expense tracking, recurring transactions, data export, and beautiful Material Design UI. Demonstrates proficiency in mobile development and state management.
contributions: Built cross-platform app with single codebase
Implemented local SQLite database for offline storage
Created interactive charts for expense visualization
Designed intuitive UI following Material Design guidelines

projects.title: SNA HoneyPot Security Tool
projects.shortDesc: Windows-based honeypot system for network security analysis and threat detection.
projects.fullDesc: A sophisticated honeypot security tool built in Python for Windows environments. This project implements a deceptive network service that attracts and logs malicious activities, helping security teams understand attack patterns and improve defenses. Features include real-time logging, attack pattern analysis, alert systems, and detailed reporting. Part of Social Network Analysis security research.
contributions: Developed honeypot service to attract attackers

projects.title: Medical AI Chatbot
projects.shortDesc: AI-powered healthcare assistant using NLP for medical queries and information.
projects.fullDesc: An intelligent medical chatbot leveraging natural language processing and machine learning to assist users with health-related queries. The system provides information about symptoms, potential conditions, and general health advice while clearly directing users to seek professional medical help for serious concerns. Built using Python, Jupyter Notebooks, and modern NLP libraries.
contributions: Trained NLP model on medical datasets
Implemented intent recognition for health queries
Built conversational flow with context retention

projects.title: DevOps Docker Infrastructure
projects.shortDesc: Containerized application deployment with Docker, CI/CD pipelines, and orchestration.
projects.fullDesc: A comprehensive DevOps project demonstrating containerization best practices with Docker. Includes multi-container applications, Docker Compose configurations, CI/CD pipeline integration, and container orchestration patterns. Features automated builds, testing pipelines, and deployment strategies for production environments.
contributions: Created optimized Dockerfiles for multiple services
Implemented CI/CD pipelines with GitHub Actions

projects.title: GitHub Actions CI/CD Project
projects.shortDesc: Automated testing, building, and deployment workflows using GitHub Actions.
projects.fullDesc: A demonstration project showcasing advanced GitHub Actions capabilities for continuous integration and deployment. Features include automated testing on multiple environments, build optimization, artifact management, deployment to various platforms, and reusable workflow patterns. Serves as a reference implementation for DevOps best practices.

projects.title: Siber Koza Company Website
projects.shortDesc: Professional corporate website for Siber Koza cybersecurity company.
projects.fullDesc: A modern, professional corporate website designed and developed for Siber Koza, a cybersecurity consulting firm. The website features a sleek design showcasing company services, team profiles, case studies, and contact information. Built with responsive design principles, SEO optimization, and performance best practices. Includes content management capabilities and lead generation forms.

projects.title: Siber Koza Mobile App
projects.shortDesc: Cross-platform mobile application for Siber Koza client services and communications.
projects.fullDesc: A cross-platform mobile application developed for Siber Koza to enhance client engagement and service delivery. The app provides secure communication channels, service request management, incident reporting, and real-time notifications. Built with React Native for iOS and Android compatibility, featuring modern UI components and secure authentication.
contributions: Built cross-platform app with React Native

projects.title: Flutter Authentication System
projects.shortDesc: Secure login and registration system with modern UI built in Flutter.
projects.fullDesc: A complete authentication system implementation in Flutter featuring secure login, registration, password recovery, and session management. The project demonstrates Flutter best practices including state management, form validation, API integration, and beautiful Material Design components. Serves as a reusable authentication module for Flutter applications.
contributions: Built form validation with error handling

projects.title: Weather Application
projects.shortDesc: Real-time weather app with location-based forecasts and beautiful UI.
projects.fullDesc: A modern weather application providing real-time weather data, forecasts, and location-based services. Features include current conditions, hourly and daily forecasts, weather alerts, and a visually appealing interface with dynamic backgrounds based on weather conditions. Integrates with weather APIs for accurate, up-to-date information.
contributions: Integrated weather API for real-time data
Created dynamic UI based on weather conditions
Built responsive design for all devices

projects.title: NGO Management System
projects.shortDesc: Full-stack web application for NGO operations, donations, and volunteer management.
projects.fullDesc: A comprehensive web application built for NGO management, featuring donation tracking, volunteer coordination, event management, and reporting capabilities. Built with PHP and MySQL backend with a responsive frontend. Includes admin dashboard, donor management, campaign tracking, and financial reporting modules.
contributions: Designed database schema for NGO operations
